official_title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 120 North Main Street in Fallon, Nevada, as the "Rollan D. Melton Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 120 North Maine Street in Fallon, Nevada, as the Rollan D. Melton Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 120 North Main Street in Fallon, Nevada, as the "Rollan D. Melton Post Office Building".
